title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, snap peas)
instructions:
1. Heat vegetable oil in a large pan over medium-high heat.
2. Add minced garlic and grated ginger, cook until fragrant.
3. Add mixed vegetables to the pan, stir-fry for 5-7 minutes until tender-crisp.
4. Drizzle soy sauce and sesame oil over the vegetables, toss to combine.
5. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
6. Serve hot as a side dish or over cooked rice.
